Macros

#define VPS_DISP_DRV_BASE   (0x00000100U)
 Driver ID base for the display driver class.
 
#define VPS_CAPT_DRV_BASE   (0x00000200U)
 Driver ID base for the capture driver class.
 
#define VPS_M2M_DRV_BASE   (0x00000300U)
 Driver ID base for the M2M driver class.
 
#define VPS_MISC_DRV_BASE   (0x00000400U)
 Driver ID base for the other driver class.
 
#define VPS_USER_DRV_BASE   (0x00000500U)
 Driver ID base for the custom/user driver class.
 
#define FVID2_VPS_DISP_DRV   (VPS_DISP_DRV_BASE + 0x00000000U)
 Display driver ID used at the time of FVID2 create.
 
#define FVID2_VPS_DCTRL_DRV   (VPS_DISP_DRV_BASE + 0x00000001U)
 Display controller driver ID used at the time of FVID2 create.
 
#define FVID2_VPS_CAPT_VID_DRV   (VPS_CAPT_DRV_BASE + 0x00000000U)
 Video capture driver ID used at the time of FVID2 create.
 
#define FVID2_VPS_M2M_DRV   (VPS_M2M_DRV_BASE + 0x00000000U)
 M2M driver ID used at the time of FVID2 create.
 
#define FVID2_VPS_COMMON_M2M_INTF_DRV   (VPS_M2M_DRV_BASE + 1U)
 FVID2 Driver ID for the common M2M interface.
 
#define FVID2_VPS_DSS_M2M_DRV   (VPS_M2M_DRV_BASE + 2U)
 FVID2 Driver ID for the DSS M2M driver.
 
#define FVID2_VPS_CTRL_DRV   (VPS_MISC_DRV_BASE + 0x00000000U)
 VPS control driver ID used at the time of FVID2 create.
 
#define VPS_COMMON_IOCTL_BASE   (FVID2_USER_BASE + 0x00000000U)
 IOCTL base address for the IOCTLs common to display, capture and mem to mem drivers.
 
#define VPS_DISP_IOCTL_BASE   (FVID2_USER_BASE + 0x00010000U)
 IOCTL base address for the display driver IOCTLs.
 
#define VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE   (FVID2_USER_BASE + 0x00020000U)
 IOCTL base address for the display controller driver IOCTLs.
 
#define VPS_CAPT_IOCTL_BASE   (FVID2_USER_BASE + 0x00030000U)
 IOCTL base address for the capture driver IOCTLs.
 
#define VPS_M2M_IOCTL_BASE   (FVID2_USER_BASE + 0x00040000U)
 IOCTL base address for the M2M driver IOCTLs.
 
#define VPS_CTRL_IOCTL_BASE   (FVID2_USER_BASE + 0x00050000U)
 IOCTL base address for the VPS control driver IOCTLs.
 
#define VPS_ADV_IOCTL_BASE   (FVID2_USER_BASE + 0x00060000U)
 IOCTL base address for the advanced debug capabilities. Caution: To be used with care.
 
#define VPS_USER_LAYOUT_ID_BASE   (100U)
 Multi window layout ID base for the user created layouts.
 
#define VPS_CAPT_INST_VIP_BASE   (0U)
 VIP driver instance ID base.

 Number of VIP driver instances.

 Number of ISS based capture driver instances.

#define VPS_CAPT_INST_ID_MAX   (VPS_CAPT_INST_ISS_END)
 Cumulative number of capture instances supported.
 
#define VPS_MAX_STREAMS   (16U)
 Maximum number of streams supported by the VPS driver, Used in allocating array size.
 
#define VPS_VIP_IRQ_MAX   (3U)
 Maximum nember of VIP instances across all platforms. This is defined here to make the interface not dependant on the specific build and platform.

Typedef Documentation

typedef UInt64(* Vps_TimeStampFxn) (void *args)

Function prototype, to determine the time stamp.

Parameters
args[IN] Not used as of now.
Returns
An unsigned int 64 value, that represents the current time in usec.

Function Documentation

Int32 Vps_deInit ( Ptr  args)

VPS deinit function.

Uninitializes the drivers and the hardware and should be called during system shutdown. Should not be called if Vps_init() is not called.

Parameters
args[IN] Not used currently. Set to NULL.
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate FVID2 error code on failure.
Int32 Vps_init ( const Vps_InitParams *  initPrms)

VPS init function.

Initializes the VPS drivers and the hardware. This function should be called before calling any of driver API's and should be called only once.

Parameters
initPrms[IN] VPS Initialization parameters. If NULL is passed, the default parameters will be assumed - address translation disabled.
Returns
BSP_SOK on success else appropiate FVID2 error code on failure.
void VpsInitParams_init ( Vps_InitParams *  initPrms)

Vps_InitParams structure init function.

Parameters
initPrms[IN] Pointer to Vps_InitParams structure.
